description: A latte or caff√® latte is a milk coffee that is a made up of one or two shots of espresso, steamed milk and a final, thin layer of frothed milk on top
The macchiato is an espresso coffee drink, topped with a small amount of foamed or steamed milk to allow the taste of the espresso to still shine through
A cappuccino is the perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk and foam
An americano is just water and espresso. Is served 1/3 espresso to 2/3 water,
Espresso is made by forcing very hot water under high pressure through finely ground compacted coffee
Domashno coffee is a style of coffee prepared in a cezve using very finely ground coffee beans without filtering
